channel.title: Toothfairy Stardust - Neon Knights EP
channel.description:
Hello fellow Auxyfriends,
I've just now released a 3 track EP with some videogame and 80s touches to it. All music made in Auxy with a little bit of mixing in Pro Tools. First ever electronic music I've created but im kinda happy with the result.
Give it a listen and let me know what you think, or not :slight_smile:
See ya!
https://soundcloud.com/toothfairystardust/sets/neon-knights
